TopicTitle: Hello from SK! (If you know where it is without Google, PM me :D)

Articles.Content:
Hello, fellow [what is the proper name?] Kerbanauts

I'm new to these forums and don't really know who to address.

So, my first note is for the devs: This game is f***ing amazing!

I mean - seriously. If I had the idea (and time) for a game like this, I'd prolly program it myself

Great great job on the realization - the game is so much fun and so neat.

Anyway, really happy I could join, and now for some bug reports

s16

Hi s16, welcome to the community

KSP's the game many of us didn't know we wanted, but are really glad it was made

Have fun on the forums and in KSP, and fly safe!

Hello and welcome, and without googling I am guessing you are from either South Korea or Saskatchewan...eh.

Welcome to your new addiction.
